items.sentence: Tom noticed a wedding ring on Mary\'s finger.
I told Tom he should try to do it by himself.
I told Tom that I thought it was a good idea.
Please put some candles on the birthday cake.
I can\'t believe your mom made you wear that.
Tom died just three days after Mary was born.
Tom does everything in such a roundabout way.
Did Tom tell you about what he did last week?
Where were you on the night Tom was murdered?
Who do you think the author of this novel is?
I want this matter taken care of immediately.
I want to emphasize this point in particular.
I want to get as far away from here as I can.
I want to spend the rest of my life with you.
Tom was surprised that Mary had a motorcycle.
Tom wondered if Mary could understand French.
I want to hear all about your trip to Boston.
I want to know why you were absent yesterday.
I want to live comfortably when I become old.
You gave me your word that you would do that.
Tom is three years older than you, isn\'t he?
Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t likely to be busy.
Tom went back to his car to get his umbrella.
Tom went into his office and closed the door.
Tom went to his room and sat down on his bed.
Tom went to see Mary early yesterday morning.
Tom\'s novel has been translated into French.
Tom\'s phone number is very easy to remember.
Tom\'s purpose in college is to get a degree.
I was just going to suggest that you do that.
I think you could get Tom to do that for you.
Tom fell in love with his next door neighbor.
I found a box of Tom\'s things in the closet.
Tom said he hopes to be back by October 20th.
Tom said he needed to buy something for Mary.
Tom said he needed to get in touch with Mary.
Tom said he really did want to be here today.
Tom was unable to do what we asked him to do.
Tom was very nervous when that was happening.
Tom washes the kitchen curtains twice a year.
Tom wasn\'t allowed to eat lunch at his desk.
I wish I could buy you everything you wanted.
Tom told me he would never go back to Boston.
Tom took the kids to the school this morning.
Tom wanted Mary to drive John to the library.
In synagogues, people often pray standing up.
Tom is very pleased with Mary\'s performance.
I can assure you everything is under control.
Tom says he didn\'t know Mary couldn\'t swim.
That\'s the reason I started studying French.
